Container.Name: AWS_EUM_v3
Container.Overview:
AWS End User Messaging (EUM) v3.0.5 features automatic AWS phone number discovery, Chart.js analytics with fixed expansion issues and stable real-time updates, dark/light mode toggle, intelligent message segmentation (up to 1600 characters), and configurable Content Security Policy for seamless operation on custom bridge networks.
Key Features: • Modern UI with dark mode and stable Chart.js analytics • Fixed chart expansion and API routing issues in v3.0.5 • Configurable CSP - fixes br0.2, br0.100, custom networks • Automatic AWS phone number detection • Long message support with auto-segmentation • Real-time cost estimation and history tracking • Rate limiting and security features • Full UNRAID Community Applications integration
Perfect for notifications, alerts, and personal messaging. Just add AWS credentials and optionally set DISABLE_CSP=true for custom networks.
Requires: AWS account with SMS permissions and phone numbers in AWS Pinpoint SMS.
Container.Requires: Valid AWS account with SMS/Pinpoint access, AWS Access Key with SMS permissions, At least one phone number or sender ID configured in AWS Pinpoint

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: Web interface for sending SMS messages

Config.Name: Application Data
Config.Description: Stores message history and application data

Config.Name: AWS Access Key ID
Config.Description: Your AWS access key ID (required for AWS services)

Config.Name: AWS Secret Access Key
Config.Description: Your AWS secret access key (keep secure!)

Config.Name: AWS Region
Config.Description: AWS region where your SMS resources are located (us-east-1, us-west-2, eu-west-1, eu-west-2, eu-central-1, ap-southeast-1, ap-southeast-2, ap-northeast-1, ca-central-1)

Config.Name: Disable CSP Headers
Config.Description: Disable CSP completely to allow external resources (recommended for br0.x networks)

Config.Name: Network Host
Config.Description: Specify your network host/IP for CSP whitelist (e.g., http://192.168.2.1 for br0.2)

Config.Name: Rate Limit (Messages/Minute)
Config.Description: Maximum SMS messages per minute per IP (prevents abuse)

Config.Name: Maximum Message Length
Config.Description: Maximum characters allowed in a single message (SMS will auto-segment)

Config.Name: Message History Retention
Config.Description: Number of messages to keep in history

Config.Name: Update Check Interval (hours)
Config.Description: How often to check for updates (in hours)
